About

Hi, I am Ottmar Gobrecht, an Oracle Database developer living in Munich, Germany. HydeBar is a free time project with the focus on delivering a solid, customizable foundation without any hidden blackbox except Jekyll itself. It can run on GitHub Pages with an initial setup time less than 5 minutes. This is possible by forking the project, renaming the repository to yourUserName.github.io and setting up the url/baseurl in the _config.yml - see also the relevant section on the features page.

The whole site exists as template, documentation and showcase - you should delete the content above and place your own here ;-)

CSCA48 Summer 2019
